lender.name: ifeanyi
lender.loan_because: i am in need of money to giude me through my education
lender.occupational_info: student

lender.name: Weary traveller
lender.loan_because: I've got plenty and travel a lot and see people who don't have enough.
lender.occupational_info: I can't.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand.

lender.name: duncan
lender.loan_because: As a Christian I believe God gives me a responsibility to share His gifts to me with others. Jesus said "I am the Way, the Truth and the Life, no one comes to the Father except through me".

lender.name: Regina
lender.loan_because: I think women are in an especially difficult position if it comes to getting loans and I would like to support women entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I am looking after advertising sales for an international business publication

lender.name: Nicola
lender.occupation: Soon to be a student again! : )

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Analysing investment opportunities to help my clients make money

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: we are all God's children and we share what we have

lender.name: Justine
lender.occupational_info: I am working as a Kiva Fellow in Malaba, Kenya, a small town on the border of Uganda. I, along with 5 other Brown University students composing a Students of the World team, will be making a documentary film on the work of Kiva with the MFI PEMCI.

lender.name: Antonia
lender.loan_because: I feel connected to the person I loan and it makes me happy to help others to create a better life. I like the possibility to relend my money over and over. And last but not least I enjoy to be surrounded by wonderfully caring people from all over the world :-)
lender.occupational_info: I do different voluntary work

lender.name: Christophe
lender.loan_because: globalization is for everyone

lender.name: Carter
lender.loan_because: I can and it helps others.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to have a nice job and live in a lovely country. If everyone can help just one person, and in turn that person can help one more. Then the world would be a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Law firm. I look after their computers and their technical needs

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: Developing financial IT solutions for large companies as well as my own company.

lender.name: Abubacker-siddick
lender.loan_because: To fund elders in my village who were organised in the name of ELDERS SELF HELP GROUP- Karaikudi, Tamilnadu. These 22 elders were aged 60 years and above with the motivation of making themselves employed with Garment making, fibre rope making etc.
lender.occupational_info: Social worker interested in helping children who need good education and elders who need someone for their food.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: It helps.
lender.occupational_info: Support and sale of work by artists.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping people better their lives --it is the least I can do, as I have a wonderful life!
lender.occupational_info: I am a Mom. I once worked as a teacher in Newark, NJ, for 7 years, then worked at home as a Mom, then managed a gift shop for 10 years.

lender.name: raf sanchez
lender.loan_because: the disparities between rich and poor are getting ever greater. Whilst I do donate to charities, I would like to be able to help entrepreneurial individuals in a real and immediate way and kiva.org appears to be a great way to do this.

lender.name: Margot
lender.loan_because: Our world economic system is unjust. And I want to help in a respectful way.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a safe house for women and children fleeing a violent home situation, and also as a waitress serving food at a restaurant on the beach

lender.name: Scott Carbone
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Zach
lender.occupational_info: Technical Sales Professional

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I have been so very fortunate in my life and I feel it is God's wish that I help others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired law-enforcement officer and I have seen first hand what a little help can do to change a person's life.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance to start and grow their businesses

lender.name: Josep Ll.
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs financial help sometime.However, we all have dreamed of getting loans with no interest and that if we really can't pay they can be condoned. Kiva allows me to lend directly to the entrepreneurs, so I am happy to take the opportunity.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: Years ago I wrote training materials for the Kenya Women Finance Trust and met wonderful people. Now, through KIVA, we can enable others to follow their dreams even if we can't be there with them.
lender.occupational_info: I have retired after many years as a staff member at a university and now love to read and travel.

lender.name: Marijn
lender.loan_because: I have enough and money should be used.

lender.name: Konstantinos
lender.loan_because: I love to help people, it's more fun than anything else.
lender.occupational_info: My work is very interesting and fulfilling, have spare time to do things I like

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: Unto whomsoever much is given, of him shall be much required.

lender.name: James
lender.occupational_info: Divorce Lawyer

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: I have so much more than the people on these pages and can easily afford to help out and make a difference.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: these vibrant, BOP-country entrepreneurs are the torchbearers of responsible business. They make money to feed their families and make their corner of the world a better place -- not to buy Ferraris.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate and want to be able to give to others who may not be as lucky as myself.
lender.occupational_info: I help people improve their lives by improving their health and fitness.

lender.name: Dean
lender.loan_because: Gov'ts aren't doing enough, so individuals have to step in. Enough individuals can make a difference!

lender.name: Thomas Mayer
lender.loan_because: Making a positive difference in the world, one 25 dollar loan at the time.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.occupation: Mom First/ Illustrator on the side
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: If I kept the money in my pocket, I'd just spend it on something silly.
lender.occupational_info: I sit all day in a cubicle and gaze out the window, wishing I was there with the borrower, fishing or selling my wares in a market, rather than watching myself grow old.

lender.name: Sven & Katharina
lender.loan_because: I'm an entrepreneur at heart and like to see businesses flurish
lender.occupational_info: Sven: Branch Manager for retail bank; Katharina: MD/Researcher in public health

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people develop their full life potential.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: My ancestors are from Eastern Poland/Western Ukraine. My family has been increasingly successful in the ~4 generations that we've been in the US, so I see this as a small way of giving back to my original homeland.
lender.occupational_info: I am an assistant professor in biology at a small state college in Massachusetts.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: We need to start somewhere in helping people who need it.
lender.occupational_info: I organise the installation of computers and telephones

lender.name: juan
lender.loan_because: hola quiero un prestamos para el apiario y asi producir mas
lender.occupational_info: el`prestamas puede ser de 1.000.00 dolares gracias

lender.name: Adrienne and Michael
lender.occupational_info: Michael is a photographer, fine cabinet maker and artist. Adrienne is a writer and small business owner who started her now successful business on a very small budget so I know how far a few hundred dollars can go!

lender.name: Vivian
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I think,I donÂ´t have to....everyone knows a Nurse ;-)

lender.name: Arda
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help others!

lender.name: Shaun
lender.loan_because: It seems to be an easy way to help people out.

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find and buy homes. I mostly work with people getting their first home. My business donates a portion of all revenue to charity.

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: I really like the idea of reaching out to individuals globally, and am also impressed with the immediacy of the responses.

lender.name: moira
lender.loan_because: my grandchildren Alma and Numen and my daughter Arabella wanted to make me a gift to show that they care about me and that we care together even oversea.
lender.occupational_info: They think I'm a great teacher because I am so passionate about literature and my students.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: i believe in the politics on kindness, and the action of compassion... and that even such small efforts can make big changed, offering hope and a fighting chance... and i hope, helping to bring peace to our wold as a whole
lender.occupational_info: Massage is about offering someone a chance to rest and be renewed, to soothe away aches and stress, and to take care of someone so they are better able to do what they need to do in life.

lender.name: Arianna
lender.loan_because: I'd like to think I'm making a difference somehow.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a high school student whose goal is to go to a prestigious University to study Business.

lender.name: Joshua & Demetria
lender.loan_because: Because if more people did it it would be a much better world.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I think this is a fantastic way to help.
lender.occupational_info: I make maps.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: I want to create a sustainable economical world that subverts the Empire.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I try to help others less fortunate start their own business. I think everyone deserves to be able to work and support their families so I try to help people one small loan at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I represent people when they are buying or selling their home. I assist in the transaction. I enjoy being self employed and work very hard for my clients.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: I received a gift certificate from my friends Sandy & Stew. I'm glad they got me involved because I feel that this can really make a difference!

lender.name: Carol, John & Ben
lender.loan_because: Love the idea of helping people around the world!

lender.name: Shawn/Debbie/kids
lender.loan_because: I, my wife, and our 2 young adult children want to be involved because it is so helpful for those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a small town family doctor, my wife is a retired teacher, and both our children go to University in two different provinces from the one in which we live.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: ...at the moment, I can.
lender.occupational_info: Making shows happen (dance,theatre,industrial)

lender.name: Michael & Gabbie
lender.loan_because: As a community we can bring about social change. It is also very important for me to know that 100% of the loans go to our business partners. Thank you, Matt and Jessica. & associates. Pass it on.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a greater opportunity to provide for their families. I've been lucky enough in my life and I'd like to share with other people in other parts of the world that are less fortunate.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping fellow entrepreneurs put their ideas in action in order to build a better future for themselves and inspire others to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I am a fellow entrepreneur who is actively pursuing my passion to help educate, empower and enrich the lives of the individuals and organizations we serve by providing interactive eductional materials related to personal finance, investing basics and related topics.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: It may help someone.
lender.occupational_info: I create computer programs for people and businesses.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva can help me to make a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach classes, do research, and podcast on geography and on tourism.

lender.name: Vanitha
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a fair chance. I want to do what little I can to ensure that.
lender.occupational_info: I process insurance claims for an insurance company.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I've been given opportunities in my life, and would like to give back to someone less fortunate than me.
lender.occupational_info: I work mostly on t.v. shows, loading film into the camera, changing lenses, moving equipment around etc.

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: I like to spread a little happiness - If it makes lives easier it will hopefully make them happier
lender.occupational_info: We sell commercial laundry & dishwashing equipment

lender.name: Sebastien
lender.loan_because: We live in a small planet.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a small company, we created "Urban Rivals" a online collectibles cards game.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute in making the world a little bit less cruel.
lender.occupational_info: I do my best to ensure that human rights are respected in every country in the world.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Ultimately when someone else is suffering, so am I.
lender.occupational_info: Helping poeple with chronic fatigue, fibromyalgia, depression etc. attend to what thier bodies are telling them.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: it's just luck that I was born in an affluent country and had a good education. Why not help others who didn't get this, but have drive to succeed? And be able to see it, one-to-one.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a multinational healthcare company, making sure our products exceed customer expectations, putting a smile on their faces.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It is the rare person who will never need a helping hand ... pay it back, or pay it forward...

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I want a fairer world.

lender.name: Eleanor
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a way to show gratitude for all my good fortune in life. This method is giving with dignity, not charity and it helps an entire community through one person.
lender.occupational_info: My work is to talk with a person about problems in life that are self generated and help the person make changes that better life.

lender.name: Tim Clair
lender.loan_because: To give someone help to get their lives on track... Australian's love to help others my wife Mel and my family love this concept and the way that Kiva go about distributing the funds.
lender.occupational_info: Linked in - Tim Clair Skype: Tim_Clair Structuring financial solutions for large projects requiring additional funding. Please get in contact if you would like to know more timothyclair@hotmail.com

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Its impolrtant to help others whom are not a fournate as ourselves.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the Asia Pacific, Middle East and Africa region for a large UK privately held business. Having travelled this region for the past 20 years I can understand the importance of helping others.

lender.name: Wayne & Jake
lender.loan_because: I once found a quote that challenged me how to live... "This is the true joy of life: being used up for a purpose recognized by yourself as a mighty one; being a force of nature instead of a feverish, selfish little clod of ailments and grievances, complaining that the world will not devote itself to making you happy. I am of the opinion that my life belongs to others, and as long as I live, it is my privilege to do for them whatever I can. I want to be thoroughly used up when I die, for the harder I work, the more I liveâ¦Life is no brief candle to me. It is a sort of splendid torch which I have got hold of for a moment, and I want to make it burn as brightly as possible before handing it on to future generations." - George Bernard Shaw
lender.occupational_info: Wayne: I own a small insurance agency. We sell policies that help individuals and business manage risk. Jake: I am a student, violinist, baseball and soccer (football) player who also enjoys skiing and building with Legos

lender.name: Cindy and Doug
lender.loan_because: What a great way to help change the world - one life at a time. It is wonderful to help others help themselves.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I think it's amazing that I can help someone achieve their dreams for a better life while I'm on my computer on the other side of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Manhattan for a Large Advertising agency. I fix & correct Digital Photographs on a Mac computer for magazine, Billboard & all sorts of in store advertising.

lender.name: Marion & Martijn
lender.loan_because: a small amount for us can make a big difference for somebody !

lender.name: Cobi
lender.loan_because: it's a personal way to contribute to development, and I know where my money is going.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a writer, researcher, editor and producer, focused on science, technology and international development.

lender.name: Emmanuel
lender.occupational_info: Iam an Engineer who specializes in computer maintenance, repairs, network maintenance and system administration.

lender.name: Major
lender.loan_because: ÃletkÃ¶rÃ¼lmÃ©nyeim javÃ­tÃ¡sÃ¡ra

lender.name: Jason & Cristie
lender.loan_because: God is FAITHFUL
lender.occupational_info: We help people buy and sell houses all over the world

lender.name: henry and grace
lender.loan_because: My first loan was a mother's day present from my children. I hope to continue to reinvest the money, primarily in Ecuador or the Andean region.

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: I want to share the abundance with which I was blessed.
lender.occupational_info: Rolfing is body work to improve posture and to relieve restrictions in the body which cause pain.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I support economic freedom.
lender.occupational_info: 23 year old student. I work full time and go to school full time.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I love capitalism. It works best when it is a win-win, with each party benefiting from a transaction. It also makes us dependent upon each other, and leads to cooperation and peace. It gives people control over their lives, and allows creativity to floursh.
lender.occupational_info: I am the executive director of a statewide association of conservation district supervisors. They help care for nature and natural resources on private lands, and I help assure that they have the tools and support needed to accomplish their jobs.

lender.name: Sallie
lender.occupational_info: Office Manager for a motorcycle dealership.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I teach university students while working toward a Ph.D.

lender.name: Erin
lender.occupation: Student in Women and Human Rights

lender.name: elena
lender.loan_because: helping others is a way i can honor and remember my mother...

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: I believe in work as an important value. Through a diner with some friends I discovered Kiva and his all way of helping people encouraging the business development. I checked the website and decided to make a loan because I was really enthousiastic with this new approach of solidarity.
lender.occupational_info: I work in communication making events for all kind of firms, associations, art and music festivals.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: Just trying to help
lender.occupational_info: Store owner

lender.name: Rob Miller
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lender.name: Ã travers prÃ©s
lender.loan_because: 25$ for a better world

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: This is an awesome way to help others make a better life for themselves. I have so many blessings in my life and I want others to feel the same way!
lender.occupational_info: I work with people to help them find & buy houses to either live in themselves, or as an investment to help them build wealth.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to.
lender.occupational_info: I am a painter and Illustrator.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: God has asked all of us to help others in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher and a mother of two.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way not to only help people achieve their goal, but also to give them the financial knowledge needed to be successful in their business.

lender.name: Daria
lender.loan_because: My immigrant parents and I succeeded because we were given loans and scholarships that allowed us to build better lives. I want to help people leverage their hard work and courage to achieve their potential, provide for their families, and create more vibrant societies.
lender.occupational_info: I do research using fruit flies to understand how cells move through the body. I hope that what I discover will help shed light on how cancer spreads, and thus aid in the design of new treatments.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in developing countries get started with their own business without having to rely on charity.
lender.occupational_info: I produce video games for the PC.

lender.name: Mrs Jill
lender.loan_because: Deuteronomy 28:12 - The LORD shall open unto thee his good treasure, the heaven to give the rain unto thy land in his season, and to bless all the work of thine hand: and thou shalt lend unto many nations, and thou shalt not borrow.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from the US Army and now work for myself as an independent contractor creating websites

lender.name: lynn
lender.loan_because: Such a small amount by so many people can make a difference

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: My children inspire and encourage me to give back to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I actually work in an engineering office but my favorite work/play is gardening.

lender.name: Margery
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help real people improve their lives and the lives of their families.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I drive a taxi in Central London

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed in my life with prospertiy, both personal and financial. I believe that we all must share our blessings in a responsible way with others. And I know how powerful it is to provide an opportunity to someone who really wants to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: My passions are my family, and writing software.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I'm starting my own foreign policy.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mother to two small children.

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: The kids in our Torch Club would like to help a person to succeed who in their new enterprise.
lender.occupational_info: I am a program coordinator for a national after school program called the Boys & Girls Club of America

lender.name: Rida & Aaron
lender.loan_because: God has given us much, and with that comes the responsibility to share with those who have little.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I have lived through some hard times and if I can make someones life a little easier I will.
lender.occupational_info: 50 to 60 hours a week in the elements doing construction. Hard work but good work.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I saw the piece on Kiva that aired on PBS Frontline World. This is a great way to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a seminarian at the General Theological Seminary of the Episcopal Church in New York City.

lender.name: E.K.
lender.loan_because: God blesses me, and its my duty to share those same blessings with others!
lender.occupational_info: Analytical

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I travel to third world countries regularly and always want to help. At least this way I know who and what I'm putting my money towards.
lender.occupational_info: I guide people to all parts of the world wanting to learn about climbing and other adventures.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I can't change much in this world, but I can take a little bit of money and make a big change in someone's life. It's all about the giving, not the getting...and the reaching out across borders and barriers. An even more effervescent feeling than the bubbles in a glass of champagne. Cheers to Kiva and all the folks who make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I work for the senior partner of a New York City law firm as both secretary and legal administrator. I also do fund raising for NYC arts organizations and civic associations.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I want my children to understand the value of helping others.

lender.name: C&A
lender.loan_because: We like to.

lender.name: Christi
lender.loan_because: One of my favorite bumper stickers is "If you want peace, work for justice". I don't think poor people get much justice so this is how I try to help.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: Lending through Kiva.org is a way to empower people throughout the world! It gives them the tools that they need to make their part of the world better through the direct input from their own actions.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help people understand the financial markets in our world using the latest technology

lender.name: Max
lender.occupational_info: Currently a Junior studying International Relations at Brown University, I will be a Kiva Fellow for the next 8 weeks volunteering for PEMCI in Malaba, Kenya. This includes posting video, writing, and photo journals about the entrepreneurs in the region. I'm ecstatic to document the lives of Kiva borrowers, and help to foster the amazing connections being made across the world.

lender.name: Miriam
lender.loan_because: Everyone wins. I don't loose any money in money investments and someone else in the world wins to reinvest in their family, business, and community. What a rare and wonderful opportunity. Thank you Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I travel around major US cities arranging sales events for my company during the conference season which is primarily in the Spring and Fall.

lender.name: Nancy Matson
lender.loan_because: A little bit of money from me can mean a lot to someone in the developing world.

lender.name: tessa
lender.loan_because: i got this as a 26th birthday gift and i think it is a great cause. good luck to all, my your dreams in work come true!

lender.name: Samuel
lender.loan_because: It is great to make a contribution to people showing initiative and who strive to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Although retired I am still active in trying to assist entrepreneurs and innovators to succeed with their ideas and products.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I know a little will go a long way and it feels good to help someone out.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I have benefitted from loans. I was a single mom for many years, and I am grateful other people helped me when I needed help.
lender.occupational_info: sitting at a computer, typing, talking on the phone. I bring my 2 small dogs to work - 1 sits on my lap while the other lies next to me.

lender.name: The Jacksons
lender.loan_because: Sharing is caring.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I believe in stimulating economies.
lender.occupational_info: I photograph people of merit in the arts, business and sports, have just started to teach my craft at UCLA.

lender.name: Heiko
lender.loan_because: I had a one-man business for some years. I did things that didn't need any start-up money because I would have never gotten a loan. Now that I have a job I have a little extra money and I am happy that I can loan it directly to people to help them get their businesses started. And when it comes back it goes to the next person and therefore reaches more than one person.
lender.occupational_info: I teach math at a Community College. I am also the coordinator of the math center where people can get help with their math homework.

lender.name: simian ogler
lender.loan_because: trying to restore some balance to the interesting world we live in.
lender.occupational_info: I research and design and manufacture all types of consumer products.

lender.name: Fran
lender.loan_because: It feels good. It feeds my optimism about making a difference. Lending and rollng over the repaid amounts to others gives me the gift of knowing how I am helping and is more satisfying than just donating to some impersonal charity. I feel this connects me to the world.
lender.occupational_info: I research law and certain subjects and summarize the evidence in a case to help the lawyer get ready for trial or settle a case.

lender.name: Martin and Anne
lender.loan_because: Nice to see where my money is going and follow the progress of people whose lives it affects.
lender.occupational_info: Teach at a small school in my town.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.occupational_info: I run the computer network of a large UK university.

lender.name: Abbas and Zainab
lender.loan_because: we want others to have the same opportunity we have.

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: The biggest rivers all start from small streams

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: This seems the best way to get money to those who need it and will make good use of it.
lender.occupational_info: Freelance writer and the reviews editor of Waterstone's Books Quarterly

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: To the world, you may be one person. To one person, you may be the world. Imagine if we all helped just a little?
lender.occupational_info: I give medical advice to people on the phone. They call me when they are having a problem and they don't know what to do.

lender.name: Amandeep
lender.loan_because: it's probably one of the most useful things I can do with my money.

lender.name: Alan James
lender.loan_because: A sustainable future depends upon creating global equilibrium
lender.occupational_info: I have been a teacher, a farmer, and a social worker, and still am an active member of Earthwatch.

lender.name: Keith & Janice
lender.loan_because: This our chance to help other people provide a better living for their families.
lender.occupational_info: Our company installs commerical air conditioning in South Florida USA

lender.name: Vijay
lender.occupational_info: Writes computer programs.

lender.name: Xander
lender.loan_because: the banks won't

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: I should.

lender.name: Jyaphia
lender.loan_because: I am a sister to my human family. I believe in the power of work to make us all feel strong and capable.
lender.occupational_info: Helping to build community, planting seeds of love and strength. I am a Diva Chef, a survivor who cooks for community and for sustainability. My faith, Unitarian Universalist, guides me.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: It is my opportunity to lend a hand to those who are working hard to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school history teacher, football and basketball coach. Former U.S. Marine

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping other people who are working to help themselves, their families, and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I sell books.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: The best way to help someone is to help them help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I support, work on, and with databases.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: My money goes directly to individuals working to improve their life and the life of their family.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help someone help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I create web sites for international clinical trials for Duke University.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: Every little bit helps and everyone can help make a difference.

lender.name: Bethany
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to have a goal and to need just a little help in reaching it.
lender.occupational_info: I graduated from college last year and am just getting started in life. I'm working in an office where I answer phones, greet visitors, sort mail, etc.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able do so.

lender.name: St.Genevieve High School
lender.loan_because: we can change the world!
lender.occupational_info: We are students at a National School of Character.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: This is a real and practical way that we humans on this earth can help each other across the miles. We who are blessed need to be a blessing to others. Helping people to help themselves is a wonderful opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am "retired" business person but actively engaged in life and helping others through my time, talents and money.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: "Money is like manure; it's not worth a thing unless it's spread around." - Thorton Wilder

lender.name: Jeanene & Rob
lender.loan_because: We want to help.

lender.name: The Worleys
lender.loan_because: We live in the richest country in the world! Private citizens should share the wealth. Giving to kiva.org reflects our family values.
lender.occupational_info: Pat - music fundraiser and Beale Sreet Caravan radio show host. Billie - Musician and TV commercial producer Violette - Superstar!

lender.name: Cheryl and Mark
lender.loan_because: We love the idea of connecting with entrepreneurs around the world! Here's to a just global economy!
lender.occupational_info: pastor and carpenter

lender.name: Curtis
lender.loan_because: Every human being should have a chance for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: My company's software sends and tracks messages to hospital crisis teams via their workstations.

lender.name: Traci and Edwin
lender.loan_because: We love people and what better way than to give others an opportunity to take care of themselves and their families!
lender.occupational_info: We both came from humble beginnings and think that we can never give too much!

lender.name: Ryan
lender.occupational_info: Coordinate a youth development program for high school students, and other educational programs for high school and college students.

lender.name: Jen
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is one of the very best ways to help others rise above poverty -- it gives people dignity, not charity.
lender.occupational_info: I write materials for team building programs that teach business people better teamwork and cooperation.

lender.name: Delana
lender.loan_because: Sentiment without action is the ruin of the soul. -Edward Abbey
lender.occupational_info: As a Kiva fellow this summer, I get to meet and journal about the entrepreneurs of Ghana!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Amazing

lender.name: Rajendra
lender.loan_because: I want to help the needy!

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I love God, and God loves people!
lender.occupational_info: Biblical studies professor

lender.name: Bob and Lisa
lender.loan_because: We Care

lender.name: Gerald
lender.loan_because: I think it is important to support those who are in greater needs than we are
lender.occupational_info: My work consists of attracting american companies to set up an operation in the Province of Quebec

lender.name: virginia
lender.loan_because: God will help those that help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I insure cars and homes against collision, fire, theft of personal items etc.

lender.name: Sergio
lender.loan_because: the world's financial, capital markets are unbalanced/inefficient and microfinancing allows indigent people access to what they've been denied: economic muscle!
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn Mathematics at a Community College. I also answer questions about college and assist students in all sorts of ways.

lender.name: Raquel
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help now and then.
lender.occupational_info: My family grows fruit that is shipped all over the world.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: can't keep it unless you give it away.

lender.name: Raymond
lender.loan_because: I think this a great way to empower people for long term, measureable economic improvement. The best way to change lives is to give people the tools they need to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a firefighter and a registered nurse. I have been on numerous overseas volunteer medical missions.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: It's so hard to reach people directly around the world who need help. Traveling keeps one focused on these individuals and the small amounts of capital really needed to make an enormous difference in their quality of life, health, and education. Kiva appears to meet this need beautifully.
lender.occupational_info: I design and write publications (books, reports, advertising, packaging) and websites. I'm also a photographer and artist.

lender.name: Lydia+Leo
lender.loan_because: I feel for the underprivileged.

lender.name: Richard
lender.occupational_info: I write computer software for banks

lender.name: Sombit
lender.loan_because: empowering others to reach their goals is the best gift I can give.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: My husband has his own business, so I know it is hard work, and in my own small way I want to support people like him who work hard for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a biotech company that is going to be making ethanol to run automobiles

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I feel it is necessary to use the money we have been blessed with to change the lives of people all over the world.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I admire the spirit of all of these entrepreneurs. I would like to help others on the path to a productive, abundant and joyous life.
lender.occupational_info: I design and supervise the building of houses. I am also a professor at a local college helping to educate young designers.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: There are a lot of people that need help.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: The world has given much to me and the least I can do is offer others a chance to take advantage of their opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a firm that invests in tech-related companies, adding value by bringing financial and operational expertise to companies and their management teams.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a smaller place.
lender.occupational_info: Advise companies on energy and finance issues.

lender.name: Charity
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a difference in the world through a small gesture of lending what I can afford.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Marketing for an energy service company that sells electricity and natural gas in deregulated states.

lender.name: Beverly
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer to do my part to help those in need.

lender.name: Thelma
lender.loan_because: It simply makes me happy to help someone else.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I've seen first hand how difficult some people have it in the world.

lender.name: nicole
lender.loan_because: it makes sense.

lender.name: Mary A.
lender.loan_because: I've been so fortunate myself and I want to share with those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist1

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I like that I can help people help themselves

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: A small bit from me can make a big difference in the lives of other people.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: it is my new compulsion.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university library.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed.

lender.name: NorCal Family
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate enough to be able to do so.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I don't think people really want charity. Reputable microlending is a great way for those of us with a little extra to help out those who need just a bit of cash to help themselves.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: wealth should be shared

lender.name: Rokhaya
lender.loan_because: This a great opportunity to help out around the world. It is amazing to realize how helpful the money you lend can be to others. Coming from Africa, I am familiar with the poverty reality.
lender.occupational_info: I am still at university doing my Masters in International Studies/Economic development. my area of interest is particularly Africa. I have done a great deal of researches in gender and development.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I just want to help... I never heard of Kiva until viewing a recent episode of Frontline World. I tape the show and had one day to view it before it automatically erased. Glad I watched it this evening! I immediately signed up to help.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I've need loans in the past too.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a large store that sells just about anything you can think of: clothing,food, tools etc

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I should, I can, it gives me pleasure, it improves the world bit by bit and it's better than buying something that I don't really need.

lender.name: Lyssa
lender.loan_because: I want to raise my daughters to be aware of the rest of the world and that even small amounts help; therefore I try to lead by example.

lender.name: Lani Fischer
lender.loan_because: My name is Lani Fischer and for my 11th birthday my friends (Alaina, Morgan and Bernadette)and I put a loan together for Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: We are 5th graders in Manhattan Kansas and Kiva is a great way to clelebrate a birthday!! gifts that keep on giving.

lender.name: Benoit
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help people realizing their dreams
lender.occupational_info: I manage the business of a construction equipment manufacturer company in China

lender.name: Joan
lender.loan_because: I should! I can!
lender.occupational_info: Wonderful.

lender.name: Denna
lender.loan_because: Because my son set up Kiva for me as a gift and made me read Banker to the Poor.
lender.occupational_info: Work? What work?

lender.name: Beau
lender.loan_because: I've always been a small business person at heart, and think micro-lending is a great way to keep in the spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies organize business information with computers.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: to see the world change, we have to do something to change the world.

lender.name: Alecia
lender.loan_because: People with dreams should be able to live them out.
lender.occupational_info: I help young girls grow into responsible, confident and self respecting, community members.

lender.name: Linda
lender.occupation: Retired Bank Manager running own business

lender.name: The Blair Family
lender.loan_because: We have benefitted so much from the support of so many people - we want to pass it on!

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a helping hand at sometime in their life.
lender.occupational_info: I do part-time work as a dispatcher in a Taxi Depot

lender.name: andy
lender.loan_because: I hope my small contributions will assist people in achieving their professional goals.
lender.occupational_info: I help select stocks for a mutual fund.

lender.name: Nora
lender.loan_because: we need to share our abundance. Thanks, Kiva, for making it so easy!

lender.name: Kevin
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to be a Catholic Priest for the Diocese of St. Petersburg, Florida.

lender.name: Simeon
lender.loan_because: I'm looking to expand my business, but i need a loan for equipment as Computers, Office and Employers. There is a lot of potencial in this business.
lender.occupational_info: Currently working as a FreeLancer, and having a website for selling my php scripts and web templates. I have 7 years experience developing PHP & MySQL applications.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to help provide an opportunity to better capitalism across the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers -- a lot of them, in different capacities for different people.

lender.name: Bob and Lois
lender.loan_because: So little can do so much.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I can support entrepreneurs and others build their businesses and become self-sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing-I help my company find customers for its products and help develop new products to meet our customers' needs.

lender.name: MICHAEL
lender.loan_because: Much has been given to me, and now I give to others. By the Grace of God
lender.occupational_info: I am a store owner who sells floor covering for commercial and residential. Carpet, wood, tile, ect.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: To help others improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I build and maintain business relationships, negotiate deals, and oversee the development of technology products.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I am blessed.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I believe in the potential of every person for good.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching/learning about World Religions in a Colorado community college. Non-denominational ministry of presence and prayer to the ill in our local hospital.

lender.name: Rudy
lender.loan_because: We should all help each other! Money is energy and we are all energy. Energy should circulate.
lender.occupational_info: Passionate about life! A belief in the "Magnificent Obsession"!

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Its a win/win. I feel good knowing I've helped someone out and they create a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a distributor of Laboratory Supplies and Equipment.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference to women around the world.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: A Mother's Day gift from my son and his family.

lender.name: TERRY
lender.loan_because: I want others to succeed
lender.occupational_info: I help people with tax problems

lender.name: hawaiki
lender.loan_because: It's my turn :)
lender.occupational_info: Learning to teach and teaching to share English

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: It's a great way for me to help others!

lender.name: PdF Fencing Club
lender.loan_because: This is a project started by one of our students. The money we loan has been collected by returnable bottles.
lender.occupational_info: We teach the sport of fencing to children and adults.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I believe in the power of free enterprise to effect positive change in people's lives
lender.occupational_info: I work on computer systems software for an electric and gas utility

lender.name: Daniel Johnson
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Saving lives, by making students safe skydivers

lender.name: Mike Eros
lender.occupation: Climate scientist and Global Health Activist
lender.loan_because: I loan on behalf of mothers and women, who have been so important in changing my life for the better, and who I believe channel future world peace, prosperity, and sustainable development.
lender.occupational_info: I am trying to develop a better scientific understanding of how our planet -- as a unified system -- reacts to extreme climate change, and the fundamental forces that drive this climate change.

lender.name: Kristell
lender.loan_because: $25 I don't need to use this month could be used by somebody else who does so why not loaning it...

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: I am looking at innovative ways of using technology for humanitarian activities, and i like Kiva's model of connecting people more directly.
lender.occupational_info: I retired from my first career in designing computer systems for hospitals to see what I could do to use computers for humanitarian and philanthropic uses.

lender.name: Max (for Lilly)
lender.loan_because: This is my second time lending. I thought I could take the $50 I was going to use on presents for my 2-yr old niece's birthday and lend it to people in need instead.
lender.occupational_info: I study environmental issues - particularly climate change. After I graduate I will focus on expanding environmentally friendly construction practices to reduce greenhouse gas emissions from the construction and operation of buildings.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Because I would appreciate the same generosity if I were in the same position, Because I believe in lending a helping hand, Because I believe that through hard work we can empower ourselves, Because I believe in hope.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying international development and public policy at Harvard University. I am a humanitarian aid worker

lender.name: cynthia
lender.loan_because: I think we can change the world together.
lender.occupational_info: i assist with the administration of an airplane museum.

lender.name: Bernie & Lynnette
lender.loan_because: it enables us to help in a small way those folks who have the will and energy but lack only the resources to improve their situation.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for what I have been given, and admire those people who work hard to improve their lives and the lives of those around them.
lender.occupational_info: For 40 years I taught literature and writing in a university while my husband and I raised our family of four children.

lender.name: The Loeffler Family
lender.loan_because: We believe that everybody deserves a chance to realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: When you go to the hospital, I make sure that the digital x-rays are able to be seen by the doctor on a computer screen.

lender.name: Stacey
lender.loan_because: I am particularly interested in helping women in developing countries stand on their own financial feet.
lender.occupational_info: I use drawings, paintings, and prints to express ideas.

lender.name: Kaye & Jude
lender.loan_because: we can
lender.occupational_info: Injustice anywhere is a threat to justice everywhere. Martin Luther King Jr

lender.name: Chantal
lender.loan_because: I was able to finish college because people lent me money and I hope to improve someone else's life by helping them in the way others have helped me.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: DaleSu-FangEleanorRoz
lender.loan_because: We were inspired to loan to a young mother/entrepreneur in honor our marvelous mothers, Dale & Su-Fang, and our gorgeous grandmothers, Eleanor & Roz, on this Mother's Day 2007. We love you.
lender.occupational_info: Dale is an event coordinator for a prestigious university. Su-Fang is an accountant with the US Department of Justice. Eleanor is a retired librarian and also studied physics. Roz had a long career in the children's clothing business.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: It feels good to be able to help someone directly- and to see how I can make a change in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school math, middle school art and computers at the community college.

lender.name: keith
lender.loan_because: It makes so much sense!
lender.occupational_info: I program robot microscopes.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people realize their dreams.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Koyle
lender.loan_because: I enjoy giving people the opportunity to make a better life for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I am involved in a research project that is searching for the genes and/or gene-gene interactions that cause certain forms of hereditary epilepsies.

lender.name: Daniela
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: It is the least I can do.
lender.occupational_info: I make pretty websites that work well and are easy to use.

lender.name: Olga
lender.loan_because: I can...
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a PhD student in the area of Marketing. I wish to work in non-profit organisations in the future, work with real meaning... show we are human!

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: My loan was made possible by a Birthday Gift Certificate from dear friends. I think it is important to help people become self-sufficient.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: The people to whom we loan the money are doing everything they can to make their lives better. How can I not want to be a part of that?

lender.name: MARISA
lender.loan_because: I like who works as a owner.
lender.occupational_info: I have my little shop of second hand clothes and other things, when I'm a dressmaker. I like my job,

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I want to reach out to people in other parts of the world and help them succeed. I believe there are a lot of people who can succeed and contribute something significant to the world if given even the slightest window of opportunity and I want to participate in an organization who is helping to make that happen.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student in International Studies and Political Science. I will graduate in 2008.

lender.name: Nour
lender.loan_because: I'm very deeply thankful for all the blessings in my life and I want to give back in gratitude for who I am and what I have.

lender.name: sandra
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Build a stronger, healthier community

lender.name: Zeeshan Muhammad
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who may be less fortunate than me to make a living for themselves and get out of the poverty trap :)

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: a small amount of money can help many people, time after time

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: Kiva is such a great way to enable people to help themselves.

lender.name: Carly
lender.loan_because: a small gesture for you can mean a lot to another
lender.occupational_info: teaching motivated adults the English language. basically hanging out every day with a bunch of interesting people from all over the world. can't complain!

lender.name: Sasha
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: alain de noumea
lender.loan_because: to help so easily it's so evident we have so much they have nothing is it normal ?

lender.name: Jim & Danielle
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to sustain theirselves and their community
lender.occupational_info: Boring, Civil Servant for goverment department.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I think it is a great way to help people

lender.name: Dale & Barb
lender.loan_because: It seems like a great way to help people all over the world!

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because:
Microlending seems like a wonderful way to share my good fortune, and I hope my small contributions will make a difference in people's lives.
Please note: The loan to "identity protected" in Kirkuk, Iraq, was made by members of my Middle Eastern History class (Summer 2007) at the University of North Texas. After it was fully paid back, I rolled it over to Mohamad in Lebanon. After he fully paid back his loan, I rolled it over to Mazouza in Palestine. Now that she has fully repaid her loan, I've rolled it over to Rana, also in Palestine. I hope to keep this money active as long as possible for loans to assist Middle Easterners, in honor of my students who raised the money initially. :)

lender.name: Sunny
lender.loan_because: In this way, I can help entrepeneurs grow their businesses, support their families with dignity, and help their communities, to ultimately provide us all with a better place to live.
lender.occupational_info: I review documents that describe mechanical devices as part of applications for US patents. Patents allow inventors to protect their ideas for a period of 20 years. Many inventors are small business people who are constantly working to improve their products.

lender.name: SeÃ¡nan
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: This was a gift from our brother (in-law), and we went to Africa on our honeymoon. We want to share our blessings with others in a way that promotes hard work & growth.

lender.name: Les
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to help people develop a business and help themselves and their communities
lender.occupational_info: Photographer

lender.name: Judy & Skip McGinty
lender.loan_because: We were in the Peace Corps in West Africa and the Middle East in the late '60s and early '70s; and appreciate the power of this network of lenders and borrowers..
lender.occupational_info: Judy is a retired inner city middle school math and science teacher ...now focused on grand-mothering. Skip is a health care consutlant; and also teaches health economics & policy to MBA students. Judy and Skip split their time between Olympia, Washington and San Francisco.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Yael
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: My work is challenging, but I am continually grateful for the *privilege*. I think that the value created by microfinance is greater than the value conveyed by compounded interest.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying and working towards becoming a professor of organizational behavior.

lender.name: matthew
lender.loan_because: i find that wealth is to be shared.
lender.occupational_info: I am a special education teacher in new york city.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Microcredit is a powerful and effective tool for poverty amelioration.
lender.occupational_info: I have a Masters in Public Health Degree and my Masters Thesis was on the effect of Microcredit loans on maternal and child health in Tanzania. I am also a Rheumatologist(arthritis and autoimmune disease specialist )in Tucson, AZ.

lender.name: SÃ¸ren
lender.loan_because: I feel responsible.

lender.name: Nadine
lender.loan_because: We have so much in our lives and have an obligation to help those who deserve more in theirs. We have 2 sons and feel that teaching them to reach out to other people is the strongest action they can ever take.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked with people with AIDS for 20 years. I have worked to close youth prisons in Louisiana and now I am working on raising 2 beautiful boys and supporting my spouse who is becoming a doctor.

lender.name: sabino & marisa
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others

lender.name: Derrick
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the right to better their lives and the lives of their families, and become self-sufficient.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am a consultant and I work to develop websites on the internet. I am also a dj and I mix all forms of music together.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people one-on-one. Not long along ago, on the news program "Democracy Now!", I heard author Eduardo Galeano quote an engineer friend of his. His friend pointed out that nothing gets built from the top down except a hole. Everything else must be built from the ground up.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the government of the State of Texas. We lease state property to companies so they can build solar farms, wind farms, and geothermal energy plants. We also help companies and local governments switch their fleet vehicles from diesel to alternative fuels. And -- most exciting to me -- we co-host an annual forum for Mexico/US border states to share information and ideas about energy.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: The world is too small and beautiful to pretend that we aren't each part of each other's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am learning to be a teacher of English to adults. I used to work with computers.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I made my first contribution on Mother's Day in honor of the tremendous support that I have been lucky to have from my mom, Kris.

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: Because life is about helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Bone Marrow Transplant Clinic in Calgary, Alberta. I coordinate Bone Marrow Transplants/Stem Cell Transplants.

lender.name: Bob & Charlene
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Liz Wood
lender.loan_because: My son gave me a wonderful Mother's Day present - a gift certificate to Kiva. This is a great way to enjoy a holiday and help others. too.
lender.occupational_info: I help people prepare their tax documents for the government.

lender.name: Sherri
lender.loan_because: I want to help others have a chance at a better life.

lender.name: lenore
lender.loan_because: We have to do what we can to help each other. otherwise, we just take up space

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to live in various countries including Nigeria and understand how microlending contributions can be helpful to people. My family set up my account for Mother's day 2007.
lender.occupational_info: I write software that helps make the process of producing oil and gas more efficient. I look after my family (husband and three sons). I am a keen gardener and grow a lot of the food we eat.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I believe that what Kiva is trying to achieve is fantastic!

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I just learned about unjust World Bank and IMF policies in one of my classes.
lender.occupational_info: I go to college in New York City and am majoring in sociology and gender/women's studies.

lender.name: Rima
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance...

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I would like to share my good fortune in having received many gifts and loans that helped me.

lender.name: Diego Amicabile
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Creating software solutions to business problems

lender.name: Barbara + Walter
lender.loan_because: We want to show the people that it is worth working for their own future. For those who lend the money it can be a challenging chance to improve the living conditions of themselves and their families.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: people need help
lender.occupational_info: I teach students about ethics.
